## Title Trends within Mental Health Discussion on the Reddit Platform.



## Authors

Carlos van der Ley, Christine Kwon, Connor Bates , Leonardo Gonzalez

## Introduction
Mental health represents a critical aspect of an individual's overall well being as well as am important branch of Cognitive Science. Understanding not only a single individual, but a community's perceptions of mental health and addiction are important to providing people with the help and support that they need. 

## Questions

**1. Following the break out of the COVID-19 Pandemic, what mental health issue saw largest spike in discussions. 

**2. How did discussions of mental health and addiction change in 2020 when compared to the years prior.  

**3. How did economic stress change over the Pandemic (Late 2019, 2020 data), and did it result in changes in a specific emotion over the other (i.e. Anger, Anxiety, General Negative Emotion)

**4. Do trends within addiction mirror mental health trends?

### Data Import

```{r}
if(!file.exists("reddit_mental_health_report.zip")) {
  cidr <- getwd()
  mkfldr <- "data/"
  dir.create(file.path(cidr, mkfldr), recursive = TRUE)
  osf_retrieve_file("https://osf.io/7peyq/data/input/5efd0743af1156008d3b5532") |>

```

### Data Wrangling

```{r data-wrangling}

if(!file.exists("data/mental_health.zip")) {
  # GET RELATED MENTAL FILES
  mental_files = "anxiety| |socialanxiety | healthanxiety | autism | adhd | ptsd | lonely | depression | suicidewatch | bipolarreddit | bpd | addiction | alcoholism | schizophrenia"
  
  data <- list.files(recursive = TRUE,
                     path = "data/reddit_mental_health_dataset",
                     pattern = mental_files,
                     full.names = TRUE) |>
    purrr::map(~read_csv(.))
  
  # COMBINE DATASETS
  red_mh <- data |>
    map_df(bind_rows)
  
  # SELECT IMPORTANT FEATURES FROM DATASET
  red_mh <- red_mh |>
    select(subreddit, author,	date, sent_neg, sent_neu, sent_pos, isolation_total, domestic_stress_total, liwc_anger, liwc_anxiety, liwc_negative_emotion, liwc_positive_emotion, liwc_sadness)
  
  # SAVE THE FINAL DATASET
  save(red_mh, file="data/mental_health.rda")
  
  # DELETE RAW DATA: 107 FILES, +/- 2.6GB
  unlink("data/reddit_mental_health_dataset", recursive = TRUE)
}

```

#### Load the data

```{r}
# LOAD THE DATASET
load("data/mental_health.rda")
```
